items.title: Trump Plans to Meet With Putin to Talk About a Cease-Fire in Ukraine
items.summary: President Trump had grown increasingly frustrated with his Russian counterpart for dragging on its three-year war on Ukraine.

items.title: Hacked Airport P.A. Systems Broadcast Anti-Trump and Pro-Hamas Messages
items.summary: The hacks at four North American airports raised fresh concerns over the security of noncritical but highly visible airport infrastructure. The airports said the disruption was minimal.

items.title: Senator Mitch McConnell Stumbles and Falls at the Capitol
items.summary: The former Senate Republican leader has had a series of health episodes, including falls, in recent years. He plans to retire in 2027.

items.title: U.S. B-52s and Helicopters Fly Near Venezuela in Show of Threats
items.summary: The Trump administration is sharply increasing U.S. military pressure on the government of Nicolás Maduro.

items.title: Venture Capitalist Resigns From Salesforce Foundation Over Benioff Comments
items.summary: Ron Conway stepped down from the board of Salesforce’s philanthropic arm after the company’s chief executive, Marc Benioff, said he supported President Trump and wanted the National Guard to come to San Francisco.

items.title: She Self-Deported. Now She and Other Crime Survivors Are Suing ICE.
items.summary: Lawyers argue that the agency’s new policies have led to the detention and removal of victims of domestic violence and trafficking, despite their legal protections.

items.title: Illinois governor JB Pritzker won $1.4m gambling last year, tax filings reveal
items.summary: <p>Pritzker, a billionaire, says he plans to donate winnings from playing blackjack on Las Vegas trip</p><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/illinois">Illinois</a> governor JB Pritzker made more than $1.4m while gambling in Las Vegas last year, <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/jb-pritzker-won-14-million-vegas-playing-blackjack-rcna237961">according to </a>federal tax filings released by his campaign team.</p><p>Pritzker, already a billionaire with a <a href="https://www.forbes.com/profile/pritzker/">family net worth</a> of $41.6bn, who is widely seen as a <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/apr/28/jb-pritzker-speech">potential</a> 2028 Democratic presidential candidate, won the money after playing blackjack at a Las Vegas casino while on vacation with his wife and friends, <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/jb-pritzker-won-14-million-vegas-playing-blackjack-rcna237961">according to</a> his campaign spokesperson.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/oct/16/jb-pritzker-illinois-gambling-money">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Trump says he will meet Putin in Hungary after ‘productive’ call – live
items.summary: <p>US president says he and Russian leader agreed to convene next week in an undetermined location in Budapest</p><p>A reminder that my colleagues <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/world/live/2025/oct/16/gaza-ceasefire-israel-hamas-palestine-rafah-hostages-live-news-updates?filterKeyEvents=false&amp;page=with%3Ablock-68f0d6d18f08d2cfa010dfdd#block-68f0d6d18f08d2cfa010dfdd">are covering the latest developments </a>out of the Middle East, as Israel and Hamas continue to carry out various aspects of the US brokered ceasefire deal.</p><p>This includes the news today that <strong>Israel returned the bodies of 30 Palestinians to Gaza, bringing the total number handed over to 120, according the Gaza health ministry and Nasser hospital in Khan Younis.</strong></p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/oct/16/trump-latest-shutdown-vote-jd-vance-republicans-democrats">Continue reading...</a>
